list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the ability to assess and initiate things independently.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: use your initiative, imagination, and common sense
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Sử dụng sáng kiến, trí tưởng tượng và ý thức chung của bạn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the power or opportunity to act or take charge before others do.
an act or strategy intended to resolve a difficulty or improve a situation; a fresh approach to something.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a new initiative against car crime
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một sáng kiến mới chống lại tội phạm xe hơi

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (especially in some US states and Switzerland) the right of citizens outside the legislature to originate legislation.
